ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"لِنَجْعَلَهَا","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":73154,"word_number_in_surah":61,"word_translation":"That We might make it","word_transliteration":"linaj'alaha"},{"word_arabic":"لَكُمْ","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":73155,"word_number_in_surah":62,"word_translation":"for you","word_transliteration":"lakum"},{"word_arabic":"تَذْكِرَةً","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":73156,"word_number_in_surah":63,"word_translation":"a reminder","word_transliteration":"tadhkiratan"},{"word_arabic":"وَتَعِيَهَا","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":73157,"word_number_in_surah":64,"word_translation":"and would be conscious of it","word_transliteration":"wata'iyaha"},{"word_arabic":"أُذُنٌ","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":73158,"word_number_in_surah":65,"word_translation":"an ear","word_transliteration":"udhunun"},{"word_arabic":"وَاعِيَةٌ","word_ayah":12,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":73159,"word_number_in_surah":66,"word_translation":"conscious","word_transliteration":"wa'iyatun"}]
